[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"AntV Infographic 提供了一些工具函数，方便在布局或自定义组件中复用几何计算与节点操作。"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"clone-element","children":"cloneElement "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["浅拷贝一个 JSX 节点并覆写部分属性，常用于布局中调整子元素的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"x"}],"/",["$r","code",null,{"children":"y"}]," 或样式。"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"function cloneElement(
  element: JSXElement,
  props?: Partial<typeof element.props>
): JSXElement;
"}]}],"
",["$r","table",null,{"children":[["$r","thead",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","th",null,{"children":"参数"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"类型"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"说明"}]]}]}],["$r","tbody",null,{"children":[["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"element"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#jsx-element","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"JSXElement"}]}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":"要克隆的节点。"}]]}],["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"props"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"Record<string, any>"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":"要覆盖或追加的属性，将与原有属性浅合并。"}]]}]]}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"返回值"}],"：新的 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#jsx-element","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"JSXElement"}]}],"，原对象不变。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"get-element-bounds","children":"getElementBounds "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"计算单个 JSX 节点的包围盒。支持原语节点、布局组件、函数组件以及数组。"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"function getElementBounds(node?: JSXNode): Bounds;
// Bounds = { x: number; y: number; width: number; height: number }
"}]}],"
",["$r","table",null,{"children":[["$r","thead",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","th",null,{"children":"参数"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"类型"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"说明"}]]}]}],["$r","tbody",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"node"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#jsx-node","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"JSXNode"}]}]," | ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"undefined"}]]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":"任意 JSX 节点或节点数组。"}]]}]}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"返回值"}],"：",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#bounds","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"Bounds"}]}],"。若无法推导尺寸（无子元素且无显式宽高），返回 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"width=0"}],"、",["$r","code",null,{"children":"height=0"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"行为要点"}]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["布局组件（由 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"createLayout"}]," 生成）会先执行布局函数再计算尺寸。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["函数组件优先使用显式的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"width"}],"/",["$r","code",null,{"children":"height"}],"；若缺省，则递归测量其渲染结果。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"传入数组时会递归展开并合并子节点的包围盒。"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"get-elements-bounds","children":"getElementsBounds "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["计算一组节点的整体包围盒，内部会为每个节点调用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"getElementBounds"}]," 后求并集。"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"function getElementsBounds(elements: JSXNode): Bounds;
"}]}],"
",["$r","table",null,{"children":[["$r","thead",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","th",null,{"children":"参数"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"类型"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"说明"}]]}]}],["$r","tbody",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"elements"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#jsx-node","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"JSXNode"}]}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":"一个或多个节点（数组）。"}]]}]}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"返回值"}],"：",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#bounds","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"Bounds"}]}],"。若数组为空或无有效节点，返回全 0。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"get-combined-bounds","children":"getCombinedBounds "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["纯几何工具，将多个 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Bounds"}]," 合并为最小包围盒，不处理节点。"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"function getCombinedBounds(list?: Bounds[] | null): Bounds;
"}]}],"
",["$r","table",null,{"children":[["$r","thead",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","th",null,{"children":"参数"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"类型"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"说明"}]]}]}],["$r","tbody",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"list"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#bounds","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"Bounds[]"}]}]," | ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"null"}]," | ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"undefined"}]]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":"要合并的边界集合。"}]]}]}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"返回值"}],"：",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#bounds","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"Bounds"}]}],"。传入空值时返回全 0。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"render-svg","children":"renderSVG "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"将 JSX 节点渲染为 SVG 字符串，方便在网页或其他环境中使用。"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"function renderSVG(node: JSXNode, options?: object): string;
"}]}],"
",["$r","table",null,{"children":[["$r","thead",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","th",null,{"children":"参数"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"类型"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"说明"}]]}]}],["$r","tbody",null,{"children":[["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"node"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#jsx-node","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"JSXNode"}]}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":"要渲染的 JSX 节点或节点数组。"}]]}],["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"options"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"object | undefined"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":"SVG 容器属性"}]]}]]}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"返回值"}],"：SVG 字符串。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"usage","children":"典型场景 "}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["自定义布局：用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"getElementBounds"}]," 获取子节点尺寸，",["$r","code",null,{"children":"cloneElement"}]," 写入新的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"x"}],"/",["$r","code",null,{"children":"y"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["组件自动撑开：缺省宽高时，用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"getElementsBounds"}]," 得到子内容的整体尺寸并回填自身 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"width"}],"/",["$r","code",null,{"children":"height"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["组合计算：已有预计算的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Bounds"}]," 列表时，用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"getCombinedBounds"}]," 合并，避免重复遍历节点树。"]}],"
"]}]]}]]

[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"AntV Infographic provides utility functions that help reuse geometry calculations and node operations inside layouts or custom components."}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"clone-element","children":"cloneElement "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Shallowly clone a JSX node and override parts of its props. Useful when adjusting child ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"x"}],"/",["$r","code",null,{"children":"y"}]," or styles inside a layout."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"function cloneElement(
  element: JSXElement,
  props?: Partial<typeof element.props>
): JSXElement;
"}]}],"
",["$r","table",null,{"children":[["$r","thead",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","th",null,{"children":"Parameter"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"Type"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"Description"}]]}]}],["$r","tbody",null,{"children":[["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"element"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#jsx-element","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"JSXElement"}]}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":"The node to clone."}]]}],["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"props"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"Record<string, any>"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":"Props that override or extend the original. A shallow merge is performed."}]]}]]}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Returns"}],": A new ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#jsx-element","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"JSXElement"}]}],". The original remains unchanged."]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"get-element-bounds","children":"getElementBounds "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Compute the bounds of a single JSX node. Supports primitives, layout components, function components, and arrays."}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"function getElementBounds(node?: JSXNode): Bounds;
"}]}],"
",["$r","table",null,{"children":[["$r","thead",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","th",null,{"children":"Parameter"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"Type"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"Description"}]]}]}],["$r","tbody",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"node"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#jsx-node","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"JSXNode"}]}]," | ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"undefined"}]]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":"Any JSX node or array of nodes."}]]}]}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Returns"}],": ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#bounds%60","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"Bounds"}]}],". Returns ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"width=0"}],"/",["$r","code",null,{"children":"height=0"}]," if neither explicit size nor children are available."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Behavior"}]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Layout components (created via ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"createLayout"}],") compute their layout before measurements."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Function components prefer explicit ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"width"}],"/",["$r","code",null,{"children":"height"}],"; if missing, the rendered result is measured recursively."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Passing an array recursively unfolds the children and merges their bounds."}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"get-elements-bounds","children":"getElementsBounds "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Compute the combined bounds of multiple nodes by calling ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"getElementBounds"}]," on each and taking the union."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"function getElementsBounds(elements: JSXNode): Bounds;
"}]}],"
",["$r","table",null,{"children":[["$r","thead",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","th",null,{"children":"Parameter"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"Type"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"Description"}]]}]}],["$r","tbody",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"elements"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#jsx-node","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"JSXNode"}]}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":"One or more nodes (array allowed)."}]]}]}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Returns"}],": ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#bounds%60","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"Bounds"}]}],". Returns zero when the input is empty or lacks valid nodes."]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"get-combined-bounds","children":"getCombinedBounds "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Pure geometry helper that merges multiple ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Bounds"}]," entries; it does not rely on nodes."]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"function getCombinedBounds(list?: Bounds[] | null): Bounds;
"}]}],"
",["$r","table",null,{"children":[["$r","thead",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","th",null,{"children":"Parameter"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"Type"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"Description"}]]}]}],["$r","tbody",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"list"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#bounds","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"Bounds[]"}]}]," | ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"null"}]," | ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"undefined"}]]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":"Bounds list to merge."}]]}]}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Returns"}],": ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#bounds%60","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"Bounds"}]}],". Returns zero when the list is empty."]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"render-svg","children":"renderSVG "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Render JSX nodes into an SVG string for use in the browser or other environments."}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"function renderSVG(node: JSXNode, options?: object): string;
"}]}],"
",["$r","table",null,{"children":[["$r","thead",null,{"children":["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","th",null,{"children":"Parameter"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"Type"}],["$r","th",null,{"children":"Description"}]]}]}],["$r","tbody",null,{"children":[["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"node"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#jsx-node","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"JSXNode"}]}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":"The JSX node or array to render."}]]}],["$r","tr",null,{"children":[["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"options"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"object | undefined"}]}],["$r","td",null,{"children":"SVG container attributes."}]]}]]}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Returns"}],": SVG string."]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"usage","children":"Usage Scenarios "}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Custom layouts: use ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"getElementBounds"}]," to measure children, then ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"cloneElement"}]," to update ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"x"}],"/",["$r","code",null,{"children":"y"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Auto-sizing components: when width/height are absent, compute them with ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"getElementsBounds"}]," and feed the results back."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Combined calculations: merge precomputed ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Bounds"}]," lists using ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"getCombinedBounds"}]," to avoid traversing the tree multiple times."]}],"
"]}]]}]]
